//----------------------------------------------------
// Low Poly Alphabet Neon Sign
// @ 2022 DigitalHakka
// Version 1.0
//----------------------------------------------------

Assets for creating neon signs.
Includes alphabets, symbols, numbers and diacritical marks.
Supports many languages that use alphabets.

Contains 181 models.

[Models]
Lower-cases
 Avg. 78 tris.
 Max. 180 tris.
 Min. 12 tris.

Upper-cases
 Avg. 68 tris.
 Max. 136 tris.
 Min. 20 tris.

Symbols
 Avg. 79 tris.
 Max. 272 tris.
 Min. 12 tris.

Numbers
 Avg. 87 tris.
 Max. 124 tris.
 Min. 36 tris.

[Version History]
1.0
 - First release.
